title: What are some examples of selective breeding procedures? - Quora

response.answer_text: (1) Straight-up culling. "I don't like purple monsters, so I will kill/not breed purple monsters which will result in their being less purple monsters and more not-purple monsters" (2) Line and inbreeding. "I have an exceptional monster that is the only monster I have found with red toenails. I will breed that monster and then breed those offspring together for many generations to get more monsters with red toenails." (3) Breeding with a specific understanding of genetics. "I like monsters that are splotchy, but not solid white monsters. I know that splotchy monsters have one copy of the splotchy gene and white monsters have two, so I will only breed splotchy to solid monsters to get half splotchy and no white monsters."
